commit message:
Merge pull request #2419 from raven02/patch-11

Add text shadow to message dialog that match real PSP

Merge pull request #2416 from unknownbrackets/fbo-minor

Centralize destruction of FBOs, use std::vector
Added a 'Nearest Filtering' option for testing.

Renamed Nearest and Linear Filtering to Force Nearest/Linear Filtering.
Made sure that both options aren't active at the same time.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into nearest_filtering
Simplify vertex shaders a little more in the common case of directional lights.
Parse sce_lbn more leniently, like the PSP does.

sceIoRename() ignores any path on dest.

Also, change the interface so it can return an error code.  Currently not
returning perfect error codes but it's better than before.
Update versions for Qt/Symbian/Blackberry

For AUTOSAVE/MAKEDATA type modes, '' is valid.

Don't try to use the saveNameList in this case, use ''.
Switch SIZES savedata mode to using structs.

Return error codes from SavedataParam::GetSizes().

Rather than true/false, makes things simpler.

Use the specified game/save name for SIZES.

It doesn't use the global one (not sure why...)
Switch idList to use structs in savedata.
Return a bind value in FILELIST, tweaks.
Use PSP memory directly in GETSIZES for savedata.
Linux buildfix.

Reload the savedata request if it changes.

This happens in 'Where Is My Heart?', and if it's ignored the save is
created with the wrong name and cannot be loaded properly later.
Add failure messages to savestates loading/saving. It's misleading to always say 'Loaded state' or 'Saved state', even if it fails. Plus, result was unused up to this point.
Clean up slightly.

Merge pull request #2423 from unknownbrackets/savedata

Fix some bugs in auto savedata modes, use structs
Fix a resource leak in ControlMapping.cpp
Fix a case where a pointer was being used before its null check in MediaEngine.cpp

Merge pull request #2430 from unknownbrackets/lbn-fix

Parse sce_lbn more leniently, like the PSP does

Merge pull request #2433 from lioncash/master

Fixed a resource leak in ControlMapping.cpp and a null check problem in MediaEngine.cpp
Restructure load/save failure message by reverting it back to the original and add a translation ini key instead. Much simpler, and cleaner.
Fix a comment and remove an old comment.

Add a check to an if-statement in CwCheat.cpp in function hleCheat.

Check if cheatEngine isn't null. Considering how the if-statement below it has this check, it should be placed in this one as well.
Make failure reasons translatable.
Simplify the previous commit's check a little bit.
Simplify error message via better translation key/message.
Make keys look more natural in case we have an untranslated key, and give a generic error for the missing version/not found keys.
Update ffmpeg scripts for Symbian and CMake
Blackberry Buildfix.

Merge pull request #2435 from lioncash/master

Add an extra null check to an if statement in CwCheat's function hleCheat.
Add text shadow to Yes/No/Enter/Back button

Compare with the old savedata params, not current.

Some savedata modes make changes that aren't flushed to memory right away.
Although, maybe/probably they shouldn't...

Fixes #2440, fixes #2439 (which is a duplicate.)

Merge pull request #2446 from unknownbrackets/savedata

Compare with the old savedata params, not current.

Merge pull request #2443 from raven02/patch-12

Add text shadow to Yes/No/Enter/Back button
Dumb typo.
Add a stub impl of the last scePsmf function
Reorder things a little in VertexShaderGenerator. Strangely solves a specular lighting issue I saw.
Only set uniform variables as dirty when there's a difference in value.
Fix silly light direction math bug (probably no effect mostly).

Merge pull request #2432 from thedax/saveStateFailReasons

Add failure reasons to savestate OSMs.

Merge pull request #2431 from unknownbrackets/io-rename

sceIoRename() ignores any path on dest
update submodules

Merge branch 'nearest_filtering' of https://github.com/AdmiralCurtiss/ppsspp into AdmiralCurtiss-nearest_filtering

Conflicts:
ffmpeg
lang

Merge pull request #2350 from makotech222/cwcheatUI

CWCheat: Fix ini titles (again) and add an offset for God Eater Burst codes to work properly.
Memory viewer redesigned.
Fixed ppsspp.rc encoding.

Fix a few null checks in savedata.

Fixes #2456.

Merge pull request #2460 from Kingcom/master

Memory viewer redesign

-fixed 'Copy value' in memory view
-SetFocus on right click in memory view
-added a few more default symbols to the symbol map

Change PSPPointer function name Valid to IsValid.

Improves readability and shows intent better.
Fix some signed/unsigned mismatch warnings in __sceAudio.cpp.

Merge pull request #2464 from lioncash/master

Change PSPPointer function name Valid to IsValid. Also fix some signed/unsigned mismatch warnings in __sceAudio.cpp

Improve _AtracGenarateContext.

Remove hack for releasing atrac3 voice.

Update PPSSPP.pro

I updated Symbian variables to look more clear

Merge pull request #2467 from Motaz-Alnuweiri/patch-3

Update PPSSPP.pro

Merge pull request #2466 from oioitff/atrac-fix

Improve _AtracGenarateContext, and remove hack for releasing atrac3 voice.
Update submodules
64-bit windows buildfix

Fixed missing Japanese characters in the OSK.

Also added the vowel lengthening character to Katakana and Hirigana

Fixed incorrect る/ル misplacements in the Japanese Hirigana/Katakana characters. Replaced them with the appropriate ろ/ロ character.

Fixes issue 2468.
Show a button on first run instead of taking the user directly to the plugin download screen. Ensures that the emu is usable even if the download would crash.

Merge pull request #2472 from lioncash/master

Fixed missing Japanese characters in the OSK.  Fixes issue 2386 and issue 2468

-disassembly view redesigned
-change the cursor with the mouse or with the keyboard
-displays symbols on the left and in opcode arguments
-press tab to toggle displaying of symbols
-click on the highlighted line to toggle a breakpoint at that position
-press right to follow a branch and left to go back a level

Merge pull request #2475 from Kingcom/master

Disassembly view redesign

Save the disasm window's size in config.

And, allow it to be smaller.
Make win32 shutdown consistent w/ NativeShutdown().
Save and restore the console window's position.

Merge pull request #2477 from unknownbrackets/windows-ui

Save and restore debug/console positions
Search through the disassembly view with Ctrl+S. Search next with Ctrl+C.
Disassemble to file with Ctrl+X or through the right click menu.
Add labels to branch targets that don't have when disassembling to file

Merge pull request #2478 from Kingcom/master

Search and disassemble to file
Remove hack for BREAK in Sol Trigger
Reduce log level that spam Sol Trigger heavily

Merge pull request #2482 from raven02/patch-14

Remove hack for MIPSInt BREAK in Sol Trigger

Revert 'Remove hack for BREAK in Sol Trigger'

This reverts commit 3d2c3c722713fc7276ab5cec71b122dac9082ec7.

This wasn't a hack dedicated to Sol Trigger.  It helps other games, and
keeping it is just like allowing games to continue on bad memory address
reads.
Fix typo breaking delete button in OSK.

Merge pull request #2483 from unknownbrackets/break

Revert 'Remove hack for BREAK in Sol Trigger'
Update native (download cancelling crashfix)
HLE GetFuncName: Correctly compare to numFunctions
Hide the plugin download button on the main menu after downloading it.
Update android version to 0.8.1 / 81
